summary: Markarth,have you forgot about it?are you tired of the daily Whiterun routine?then this mod is for you!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/7446496-1394047539.jpg[/img]
[line]
[COLOR=#366092][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=6]About The mod[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[line]
[FONT=Impact][SIZE=5]Markarth,have you forgot about it?are you tired of the daily Whiterun routine?then this mod is for[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Impact][SIZE=5]you!so i did this mod because everyone is just using Whiterun and riverwood or maybe solitude but no one is using Markarth anymore!!!This mod adds one NPC to the game 2 terraces wich give you a nice view/perspective over the city!It also makes it more imersive giving it a more nord tint.[/SIZE][/FONT][SIZE=6][COLOR=#5f497a]â˜»[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[line]
[FONT=Fixedsys][SIZE=7]Requirements[/SIZE][/FONT]
[line]
[SIZE=5][FONT=System]The mod does not require any DLC but it does require the 1.9 patch![/FONT][/SIZE]
[line]
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/7446496-1394055636.jpg[/img]
[line]
[FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=7][COLOR=#76923c]Please report any bugs to me![/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Fixedsys][SIZE=5][COLOR=#4bacc6]Don't forget to leave an endorsment if you want more mods like this[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
